text: Flavio Aquilone (Born in 1990) is an Italian voice actor and voice director from Rome. He is known as the Italian voice of Tom Felton (as Draco Malfoy) and various voice roles in movies and cartoons. His fianc√©e is the voice actress Valentina Favazza, together they have a child.
